com.arcao.geocaching.api.data.coordinates

Class CoordinatesFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.arcao.geocaching.api.data.coordinates.CoordinatesFormatter

  • public class CoordinatesFormatter
extends Object
    A class for formating geographic coordinates represented by Coordinates class to user readable format.
    Since:
    1.5
    Author:
    arcao

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected static class  CoordinatesFormatter.DDD
      Helper class to calculate degrees for coordinates
      protected static class  CoordinatesFormatter.Direction
      Value type for the direction.
      protected static class  CoordinatesFormatter.DMM
      Helper class to calculate degree and minutes for coordinates
      protected static class  CoordinatesFormatter.DMS
      Helper class to calculate degree, minutes and seconds for coordinates

      Constructors

      CoordinatesFormatter(int format)
